{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tirabrutinib is a Bruton's tyrosine kinase (BTK) inhibitor. BTK is a protein that plays a crucial role in the growth and proliferation of B cells, which are a type of white blood cell. Lymphomas are cancers that originate from these cells. Therefore, inhibiting BTK can potentially slow down or stop the growth of lymphomas. There are studies showing that tirabrutinib is effective in treating certain types of lymphomas.", "answer_choice": "A"}
